info.description: The ColorControl GUI shows all connected Color Controller Devices and their measured color data, including wavelength saturation and illuminance. Furthermore color sensor specific settings like integration time and gain can be set up easily. The Application displays the status of the sensors, giving various information in case any problems occur. It provides functionality to easily stimulate the leds on connected netX Boards. A complete testscript for a device, including the initialization of the Color Controller, initialization of the test tables and the validation process, can be generated in the application.
